thread.title: This is what Rani Mukerji has to say about her comeback film 'Hichki'
thread.title_full: This is what Rani Mukerji has to say about her comeback film 'Hichki' - Entertainment

author: The Hitlist Team
title: This is what Rani Mukerji has to say about her comeback film 'Hichki'
text:
Rani Mukerji 
Speculation over Rani Mukerji's big screen comeback post motherhood has finally been put to rest. The actress yesterday announced she will star in Yash Raj Films' Hichki, to be directed by Siddharth P Malhotra.
Apparently, she plays a disabled woman, who turns her so-called weakness into her strength. In a media statement, Rani said, "Each of us has a weakness that pulls us back. It could be a disability or any condition but if we just look at it as simply a hiccup, we can emerge winners. It won't come in the way of achieving our dreams. Hichki is built on this positive premise." Rani, whose daughter Adira is now 26 months old, was last seen in Mardaani, produced by hubby Aditya Chopra's YRF banner.
